text: Appl you knew that that was a problem
the biggest mistake Apple made this year
was the charging port at the bottom of
the Magic Mouse to pretty much any Mouse
that has a rechargeable battery you plug
it in and you keep using it and you're
okay if you don't have another method of
input into your computer and your magic
mouse dies you literally can't use your
computer anymore so Apple has a history
of making these like really interesting
decisions that turn out to be really
good ideas later like the first iPhone
was a really interesting questionable
decision that turned out to have plenty
of great ideas in it I guess people are
so used to quality Apple design and
they're used to smart ideas and design
that when something is just a little off
or not smart then it just causes a whole
bunch confusion and question seeing this
mouse with a questionable decision
that's clearly not going to turn out
well turned a lot of heads and made a
lot of people frown so I understand why
people didn't like it
runner-up for bad decision Apple May
this year is probably the iPhones
battery case which is the only reason
it's a bad decision is because it's a
hundred bucks like if it was 40 bucks I
would be like all right that's fine it's
a little ugly but it's a battery case
and it works with iOS so that's cool but
the fact that every other battery case
in existence is both cheaper and
prettier and better has a higher
capacity just kind of makes me think why
even come out with that
